metadata.title: CVE-2016-10149 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
XML External Entity (XXE) vulnerability in PySAML2 4.4.0 and earlier allowsremote attackers to read arbitrary files via a crafted SAML XML request orresponse.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-10149` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-pysaml2 - 3.0.0-3ubuntu1.16.04.1
python3-pysaml2 - 3.0.0-3ubuntu1.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python-pysaml2 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.0.0-3ubuntu1.16.04.1').
